addMovie(string,string,string,uint256,ui.details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._cancellation: True for allow refund and False for not allow refund
params._movieIMDB: IMDB ID of the Movie for getting data
params._time: Date and Time of the Movie in epoch format
params._trailer: Link of the Trailer of the Movie

buyTicket(address,uint256,uint256).details: The contract should not be paused and Movie should be Active

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall
params._tickets: Number of tickets to be purchased

earning().details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerHall(address).details: It can be only called by the owner of the Contract

reqRefund(address,uint256).details: It can be called when contract is not Paused and within Cancellation Period of 5 Mins. Cancellation should also be available for the Movie

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall

setSeats(uint256,uint256).details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall
params._tickets: No. of Tickets to be set

startBooking(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall

stopBooking(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

unregisterHall(address).details: It can be only called by the owner of the Contract

verifyViewer(address,uint256).details: It can be only called by any user.

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall

verifyViewerByHall(uint256,address).details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._movieID: Movie ID by the Particular Hall
params._viewer: Address of the Viewer to be verified

verifyViewerByHall(uint256,address).return: number of tickets owned by the viewer
